Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient!”
Reviews.Author: sbruce912
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a three day break in Berlin. This hotel is situated just off Kurfurstendamm, one of the main roads into the city centre. It is approximately a 30 minute walk to Berlin Zoo and 10 minutes to the nearest Metro Station (Adenaureplatz, Line U7). The Europa City is a typical European style establishment, offering fairly basic facilities. However the staff are affable and obliging, conversing in good English. The rooms have particularly high ceilings and are relatively spacious with comfortable beds and decent bathrooms. Furnishings are of a respectable standard. Breakfast is ok with three hot choices that partially rotate every morning, as well as rolls, bread, meats, cheeses and various yogurts and fruits. It is well insulated and quiet at night. There is a lift but it has a small capacity and is rather claustrophobic. Overall if you require a fairly central base with good access to the public transportation system this will tick the boxes.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: marmitchy
Reviews.Content: We liked this hotel very much. It was very clean, plenty of space to move around, big wardrobe, comfortable bed, free wii-fi with fast connections, location is between 2 ubahn and a bus stop right in front of the hotel. The front desk people were all nice and are very willing to help their guests most of the time. Breakfast was plenty with hot and cold meat selections. We stayed at the hotel during new years eve and they place bottles of wine in the room which was a lovely gesture. Restaurants are plenty around the area. The shopping center K'damm is about 4 minutes on foot. The area is not crowded, quiet at night. The bathroom is adequately sized no toiletries though, but has hair dryer, shaving mirror. Overall i would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Noemi M
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights Dec 30-31 for Silvestre. The rooms are very big and clean. Beds were comfortable. Plenty of space to move around. The stayed warm during our stay. Breakfast was plenty. Receptionists were all nice and was very eager to help their guests. The location is also very convenient situated between 2 U-bahn and a bus stop right in front of the hotel. The bathroom is adequately sized. Internet was fast and free of charge. Only concern is the parking but is not a big deal. They even left us 2 bottles of wine for the new year which is very lovely thing to do for your guests. We will stay there again if go back to Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staff and Hotel Clean and Adequate”
Reviews.Author: rippo4u
Reviews.Content: Stayed 9-14 November. Out from Liverpool. Weather FOG and 1c to 5c.all week. Great City. Go to the Gemaldegalerie Art Gallery after u-bahn to Potsdamer Platz station (15 mins walk) 2800 paintings of world top artists. 13 - 18 century. For 2800 bc Egypt and Rome go to Museum Island but you must register for Neues Museum, Bode Museum, Pergamonmuseum and Bundestag on-line before you leave home. Chose your preferred entry days times. Plan well ahead. Best months for weather April and May. Europa Hotel needs some upgrading no lounge or bar but just as others say totally adequate as you don't spend much time in the hotel. Breakfast is the normal self service buffet and ok. Just watch for booked in student groups. 40 Italians who were no problem and kept to themselves quietly. BUT 30 German youths/ young men with a few girls came in Friday night at 10.50. Banging and crashing into doors, bursting into rooms and screaming and shouting. Went on to 3.30 a/m Police called twice but never turned up. Night Porter could not control them as they were spread in 10 rooms on three floors. Just the usual drunks - think it clever. Do not let this put you off from booking this hotel. Location is superb. For all days meals - I just had evening meals. Go for 20 min walk to Meinekestrasse 4 for Gasthaus Krombach. German cooking. Berliner Specialties. Friendly waiters. Superb food Huge portions and real value and not expensive. Green lighted name in the window. Very busy Friday evenings. Open from breakfast time. 5*****.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Laurencederuette
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for four nights on July 8th until July 12th and I must say this hotel is good value for money. Moreover, the area is very quiet, close to transport and the staff is discrete and friendly. I definitely recommend this hotel. Laurence from Brussels

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: russ1234
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for three nights, 2 adults and 2 kids. We were able to get one room on the 5th floor. It was clean, spacious and quiet p there was a large beam angled from the wall to the ceiling but didn't really interfere with our stay. There was an elevator. The free Wi-Fi didn't work in our room (too far from router) so we had to go to the lobby. The hotel exterior and lobby were being renovated so there wasn't really any place to sit to use internet. Our stay included breakfast. It was typical European, good, but not anything extra ordinary. The staff was very helpful in suggesting sites to see. It was an easy walk to the bus lines and U-bahn, about 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “We liked it here”
Reviews.Author: MrGriffingreen
Reviews.Content: I think the review by the previous poster AlexPOxford_UK was spot on with our opinion. It's a good and very adequate 3 star hotel, well positioned and in good order.

Reviews.Title: “A very good proposition if you are not looking for luxuries”
Reviews.Author: AlexPOxford_UK
Reviews.Content: I travelled to Berlin for business and stayed in Europa City for 3 nights. A decent, clean hotel in general with a spacious room and bathroom. There is nothing extravagant but for someone who wants a nice shower in the morning followed by a good breakfast before you go to work (or site seeing) and a clean bed for a good sleep at night, this is a hotel that 'does what it says on the tin' and at a very good value for money. WiFi in the rooms does not work but the hotel people may go out of their way to help if you are at the lobby. One night I had to work till 2 o'clock in the morning and the kept their breakfast room lights on for me, offered me several times (free) coffee and generally were very helpful. The receptionists were not always smiling (which may be cultural) but were very very efficient and helpful. I was impressed with their taxi system. When a guest asks for a taxi they press a button and the taxi is there in less than 3 minutes! Breakfast is rich and with a good choice. The hotel is well located between two underground stations (different lines) giving you some good alternatives to travel around the city. I was surprised with comments read here about the location. The hotel is located only a few hundred meters away from the Mecca of shopaholics: the Kurfürstendamm, known locally as the Ku'damm, one of the most famous avenues in Berlin with all the fashion designer shops that one can imagine. Final point, the elevator can become quite tricky especially in the rush hour of the morning 08.30-09.00. It is small and very slow and if people are leaving all together you may have to wait for quite some time for it. Bottomline: If you want to spend a few days in a decent hotel near the centre of Berlin at a very reasonable cost and you are not asking for glamour, this is the one for you!

Reviews.Title: “nice stay but not in a very interesting area”
Reviews.Author: nogag
Reviews.Content: The room was very nice, clean and roomy, and clearly was renewed lately. it has no fridge and no safety-deposit box and that was frustrating. As well, there was no AC but we could manage. The hotel's breakfast was very good. The staff includes those who were more helpful and those who were challenged to speak English. For those of you who expect to find wild, young nightlife, clubs etc. by the hotel- there is no. there are several small and nice pubs, occupied mostly by elders. we heard a cab to the east side (the more smashing area) can be expensive, and metro ends at 1 am :(

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: calabreseboy
Reviews.Content: Decent hotel, although it's not really in a very bustling or happening area of Berlin. It is in the nicer area of Berlin, which is great. However, nightlife is a good 20-30 Euro cab ride away, if you're not prepared to take the metro. Lots of great restaurants around the place though. Staff weren't particularly nice but still helped you out, although at times I didn't feel very welcomed. Hotel itself has a special charm about it; rooms are decently sized, with comfy beds. Rooms get VERY warm during the day. Overall, very decent hotel considering the price. Recommended for people who don't want to stay in a hostel, but don't want to fork out hundreds of Euros for a stunning hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - Good location”
Reviews.Author: Skygirl81
Reviews.Content: I liked this hotel. It has a good location and staff was friendly and nice. It is good value for a 3-star in Berlin and you have plenty of restaurants near by. It has no bar, but there are bars nearby and I never like hotelbars anyway. Rooms were clean and the beds comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “A good bed for the night”
Reviews.Author: Edgerzz
Reviews.Content: Just returned after three nights at the Eurpoa City Hotel, out with 16 Friends from the UK. Very mixed staff, some friendly and some not friendly or helpful at all. The breakfast was fit for purpose, I think served from 7-8:30am. Bedrooms are functional and clean - nothing special, most rooms only have a shower. No bar or lounge area to relax in, simply doesnt exist, only a few chairs in reception. Not much on noisy neighbours, and not too much street noise. Summary Location is the best feature, this hotel encourages you to explore Berlin and spend as little time in it as possible. If you just want somewhere to sleep after long days out in the city then this is the place for you.

HotelInfo.Name: Europa City Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Konstanzer Str 60, 10707 Berlin, Germany
